code: import React from'react';import styles from'../../../pages/Book/Book.module.css';import{displayStars}from'../../../lib/functions';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BookInfo(_ref){var book=_ref.book;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.BookInfo,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.Author,children:"par ".concat(book.author)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.PublishDate,children:book.year}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.Genre,children:book.genre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.Rating,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:displayStars(book.averageRating)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"".concat(book.averageRating,"/5")})]})]});}export default BookInfo;
